'''''The Lay of Leithian''''' is the first album by the French folk metal band ''[[Ainulindale (band)|Ainulindale]]'', released in 2004. 

==Track listing==
*''Dorthonian''
*''The First Meeting''
*''In Menegroth''
*''And Finrod Fell''
*''The Most Beloved''
*''Ainulindale''
*''New Spring''
*''Back Before Thingol''
*''The Hunting of the Wolf''
*''A Memory in Song''
